column4: i just installed intrepid and my wlan0 is not enabled. my wireless is working but its labeled eth1 and my ethernet is eth0. how can i get it working on wlan0??
is there a way i can get my wireless working as it used to be on 8.04??
thats not a problem.  its just your wireless is being used with ethernet.   my system is the same way
if i boot my laptop up with the livecd it also shows its wireless as  eth1 too,  so its not an 'upgrade' issue
